qas.question: The term comedies refers to what?
The term comics doesn't refer to what?
When comic appears as a countable verb it refers to what?
When comedies appears as a countable noun it refers to what?
When comic doesn't appear as a countable noun it refers to what?

context: The term comics refers to the <b0_0><b1_0>comics medium<b1_0/><b0_0/> when used as an uncountable noun and thus takes the singular: "comics is a medium" rather than "comics are a medium". When comic appears as a countable noun it refers to <b2_0><b3_0><b4_0>instances of the medium<b4_0/><b3_0/><b2_0/>, such as individual comic strips or comic books: "Tom's comics are in the basement."
